subject: Re: Updated content for furnishmypad website
preview: Thanks Heath, I had a quick look and I think it is looking really good. I'll have a deeper look next week and come back to you with any final amendments/images/name etc.  Thanks and have a good weeken

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath, I had a quick look and I think it is looking really good. I'll have a deeper look next week and come back to you with any final amendments/images/name etc.

Thanks and have a good weekend

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David, 

Confirming we have made the below updates for you. 

Once the images and logo etc. are finalised we will do a final adjust/style as needed. Please note, we have only focused on the desktop version for now to avoid rework whilst the branding is evolving. 

Here is the link: https://furnishmypad.kinsta.cloud/

https://furnishmypad.kinsta.cloud/
hi, @heath please check the update. thanks

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi David, 

Just acknowledging receipt of this email. We will get right to it.

Hi Heath, We think the website is really close with just some minor tweaks. I've listed them in order as you scroll down the page, as I thought that might be easier. 1/ Colours/fonts - as per Dans email, we are going with the colours/fonts that we used on the Advantage website. 2/ Image at top. Instead of a scrolling banner at the top, we just want a single hero image. Will send shortly. 3/ between the hero image at the top and the furniture packages graphics, we want to insert the text: We help investors and home owners fully furnish their properties with designer furniture, rugs, décor and artwork:
  • Take the hassle and confusion out of DIY furnishing
  • Bespoke packages delivered & installed
  • Ex-display designer furniture
  • Curated by interior designers
  • Maximise your rental & occupancy rate
4/ Furniture package prices. We want to show the saving so we'd like to show the retail price to purchase, with a line through it and then the buy price. Similar to the FurnishX site, but we need your creativity to make it look different. They are very litigious. Example of the way they show their prices is below Please amend our pricing to be : 1 bed - RRP is $27,500. Our price starts from $13,250 2 bed - RRP is $36,000. Our price starts from $16,900 3 bed - RRP is $49,500. Our price starts from $22,400 We don't need the asterix next to each of the prices either. 5/ If you click on the "check what's included " button in the Furniture package prices graphic, it doesn't list the inventory. I've reattached the inventory for each package. If you could load the 1 bed inventory to the 1 bed click through button etc 6/ "Why choose us" heading. Can we please add a question mark to the heading ie Why choose us? Also in the text for why choose us, please delete the word "limited" and capitalise the letter "g" in greater. Please delete the reference to Melbourne as well. See screenshots below 7/ can we insert a call to action button ("inquire now") after the "why choose us?" section. This should take them straight to the contact form section 8/ Can we please move the "Three easy steps" section to above the "a taste of our work" section Please change the stars under the heading Three easy steps…. to 1, 2 3 in a circle 9/ Please change the heading " A taste of our work" to "A recent installation" I still need to send the images of this 10/ could we insert the "contact us" field in between "A recent installation" and the "testimonials" and edit as follows: "Want to know more? Call us on 1300 668 274, or complete your details below and one of our team will be in touch" And then insert the contact form. Can we make the email address mandatory too please 10/ at the footer, please amend the sentence Furnish my pad is a subsidiary of ….. and replace with "* Furnish my pad is a brand of Novari Collective" Please reduce the text size. This is just to reference the asterix in the "why choose us" section. Secondly, please capitalise the letter G in the word Greater and delete the reference to Melbourne 10/ delete the packages tab at the top altogether (and it's reference in the site map at the very bottom of the site) 11/ On the about page, can we make a number of adjustments
  1. We want to remove any reference to FRAH, so under "Company history" just say Furnish my pad is a brand of Novari Collective. Then go into the history of Novari Collective and furnish my pad. Delete the summary on Renta Centre.
  2. In the brief on Novari Collective, amend three to two (on the first line) and change the colon to a dash after the word "companies" on the second line. Please delete all the text after the word "renovations"
  3. Have an inquire now button at the bottom that goes to the contact form
  4. If you could add spots for a few more images and I will send them through
Thanks Heath Regards David McLean GENERAL MANAGER 0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com 02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019 novaricollective.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Thank you. I think the layout is excellent.

Colours need to be adjusted, but as a concept, it's easy for a customer to visually see everything they need to know.

I have a tiny edit on the "about us" section, but I'll send that through with other details (ie images) shortly.

Dan is on leave till next week. We'll look to firm up a name when he's back. He did some work on that whilst I was on leave, so I think we are close to having that resolved.

Thank you

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David, 

Just a quick email update for when we return from the break. 

We have loaded the content up here: https://furnishmypad.kinsta.cloud/ and paused in lieu of the final name, branding etc. Consider this an extremely malleable skeleton for us to refine in Jan. We will be able to get the site live pronto when the direction is refined.

Hi Dan, 

Yes, I agree, there are some good colour options in the link you sent through. 

We will wait to hear back from David and the new Marketing Manager, there is plenty of technical items that we can start on in the meantime.

Hi David and Heath

Gents, I feel like we haven't nailed the colour palette for this new site and more generally, our style guide.

I think Heath is right that we need some solid colours defined in either RGB or HEX format that can translate perfectly between website, our own documents (word, excel, canva etc) and of course print.

As a separate point though, do we need a second colour in our palette to help offset the beige?
See attached for Inspo: https://turbofuture.com/graphic-design-video/10-Beautiful-CoffeeTea-Inspired-Color-Palette-For-Your-Next-Design

Regards
Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Novari Collective

M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611 | F 02 9699 2500

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker St, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015

www.novaricollective.com.au

Thanks Heath, that's exciting. Sounds like it's coming together quickly.

1/ I'll need to get our Marketing manager to send you the logo next week. The one I sent was created by our stylists in canva. The lines don't match up correctly, so I'm not surprised that you need a better copy. I should have that for you on Monday afternoon.

2/ Very happy for you to put something together for the colours/tones

Thanks

David McLean GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi David, 

Got it - thank you! It's coming together nicely. 

All understood and we have enough to get cracking. Two points:

  • Can you please send through the logo in any formats that you have. The one in the WordDoc will be grainy on the site. 
  • The Canva colour #dddacc is going to be limited in the way that you are proposing with white text over the top of it. There is not enough colour contrast and people will struggle to read the copy, it can affect SEO as well. See attached screenshot for more details on this. I will put something forward with the same vibe, that is more readable. Hopefully you are open to this.
Regarding the redirect, yes this will be fine. Just loop Alban in as well, but from a technical perspective, we will take care of it.

Hi Heath,
We've spent a couple of days putting together a more updated brief for you on the furnishmypad website. Dan has purchased the domain name today and will give you access.
Attached please find several documents that we've prepared on our thoughts on the website design.
  1. Our packages pdf that has the graphics for four images we created that are in the draft content for web content doc.
  2. Proposed Content for web, layout and colour themes suggested. Let us know if you feel the colours we have proposed will blend into one. We need you to select a contrast colour for what our team have put together because dan and I both feel it needs some colour
  3. Testimonials
  4. "About us" and "privacy policies" for the footer at the bottom
  5. Inventory for the packages Packages.docx


Our new Marketing Manager will be in next week (Brittagh). She's excellent and we'll get her to send you :
  1. some images for the top of the website (we are thinking a carousel, but let's see what she suggests);
  2. The images for "a taste of our work"
Hope this doesn't feel like we've stifled your creativity. Very happy for your thoughts and guidance.


I'd also like to talk to you about a permanent redirect we'd like to place on Renta's website that will go to furnishmypad when it's up and running.
Organically, Renta comes up on page 1 for the google search "furniture packages for Airbnb". When you click through, it takes you to this page on Renta's website:
https://rentacentre.com.au/furnish-airbnb/
Could we instead have it got to the Furnishmypad website?


Any questions, please give me a call anytime.
Thanks




David McLean
 GENERAL MANAGER

0410 567 287 | dmclean@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019
novaricollective.com.au
